name: Harem Wars
description: Harem Wars features a non-linear story, following a series of three acts, each one triggering the continuation of the story when certain milestones are reached. During which you will have to battle a variety of characters in magical combat. Victory will gain you more power within the game and make future battles easier as you build up your power to take on your main rival. Whilst battling these various people you will also need to manage your life, pay your bills, work for money and do whatever you can to survive this new supernatural world you find yourself in.
